alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Grant; Hooker; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:03PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Arthur, southeastern Grant, southwestern Hooker and northwestern McPherson Counties through 545 PM CDT/445 PM MDT/... At 503 PM CDT/403 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Swan Lake, or 14 miles northeast of Arthur, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Swan Lake, Green Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Lena, Three Mile Lake, Big Lamunyon Flats, Cogill Lake, Calora and East Cody Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
